tmp_table <- tmp_data %>%
    mutate(OTEFDD = case_when(
      OTEFDD == 1500 ~ "Field crops",
      OTEFDD == 4500 ~ "Dairy cattle",
      OTEFDD == 4700 ~ "Mixed cattle",
      OTEFDD == 6184 ~ "Mixed crop and/or mixed livestock"
    )) %>%
    pivot_longer(cols = !c(OTEFDD,FQS),
                 names_to = "Variable",
                 values_to = "value")
